Detailed Description

Routines to run the external Graphviz 'dot' command and return bitmaps, vector graphics, etc.

Uses osSpec to determine path to dot and optional arguments for same.

Function Documentation

def dotProcessor.saveDot (   dotString  ) 

Save dot output to a named temporary file.

Returns the full path to the file, which is closed.
